description:
Garp takes a beating from a heartbroken mountain bandit, and a big, blue friend helps Luffy drown his despair in the newfound desire to reunite with his mates!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aitsura ni Aitee! Luffy Namida no Sakebi
I Want to See Them! Luffy`s Mournful Cry!
Je veux tous les revoir ! Le cri mêlé de larmes de Luffy
Я хочу видеть их! Последний крик Луффи!
あいつらに会いてェ! ルフィ涙の叫び
